page.title: 02GAMEKEEPING IN HASELOR.WARKS
page.content: We went to interveiw Mr.Steele about gamekeeping. He said that has changed a lot because now you have to train but when Mr.Steele started he did not have to train.He started as an underkeeper(a deputy gamekeeper) who just helps out.His busiest time of the year are the summer months.He has most poachers on Sunday morning and when he catches them he prosecutes them. He does not work regular hours because if he did the poachers would know when to come.He enjoys rearing grey partridge because they have a good temperament and they're so natural. He rears about 2000 pheasants a year. He says that on some Estates people shoot that number a day. They do not shoot right through the year just October to February.His greatest enemies are rats although foxes are menaces. He catches rabbits by netting,shooting,snaring or ferrets
